Review.Contenu: Bought 4 ice/water filters, to have on hand.This week it was time to change the filter.Initially I checked the box’s the part number was correct and in the same box as in the past.Opened box inside contained a lookalike part but it would not fit. They will not answer their phones Tried to use website but would not send.

I can canceled an order for water filters after seeing reviews the company sells knock off products in name brand packages. I tried calling them and there was no answer so I disputed the charge on PayPal. They responded and refunded the payment but then sent a vitriolic hateful email calling me names because they were charged a $25 chargeback fee by PayPal. Steer clear of this unprofessional and dishonest company.

Clearly really good fakes.  They look exactly like original manufacturer products, but the water tastes horrible.  I ordered a filter from the fridge manufactuer and what do you know....water tastes excellent.  We'll see if RedStag lives up to their money back guarantee

Bought two GE refrigerator water filters and received without a problem. However, these filters were clearly fake/counterfeit! The taste of the water were really bad, just like those cheap fake ones sold everywhere else. Avoid buying from them.

This company sells fake water filters.They “appear” like a legit business with a US address and phone number, but the filters dropship from random port cities and their phone number doesn’t work.They use a fake Trust Pilot style site to run up false 5 star reviews. Trustspot.io or something like that. Avoid at all costs.
